alert.note: Alert for Eastern Orleans; Upper Jefferson; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 02 at 5:58PM CST until January 03 at 10:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, temperatures as low as 32 expected. For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Upper Terrebonne County, and Iberville, Ascension, Assumption, St. James, St. John The Baptist and Upper Lafourche Parishes. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 10 PM this evening to 10 AM CST Monday. For the Wind Advisory, until 9 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. The temperature at which pipes will burst will depend on the individual plumbing system.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
